channel.title: Moparscape lags too much! help me!
channel.description:
everytime i reswapn a monster. when i fite it dies instantly even if i ave hit a 0 and when i reswapn a fishing spot it disconnects.
how do i get on other ppls servers so i can see other ppl

item.title: Moparscape lags too much! help me!
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

                            [u]How to log on servers[/u]

First, Go to the RS2 Server Advertisment section. The information on the server should be there.

                    [u]~Hamachi~[/u]

Some servers require Hamachi go here to download it,

https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/download.asp

                 [u]~How To Use Hamachi~[/u]

First,open up hamachi and click on the triangle. Select “join an existing network”. Put the hamachi name and pass in there. Get the ip number and their port and you should be able to log in. Also make sure the owner is on the network.

                           [u]~No-IP~[/u]

If you are new, i would recommend no-ip. Simple. Just get the Server IP and port and enter it.

Hope this helps :D.

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape lags too much! help me!
